definition: ترب tariba a to be or become dusty, covered with dust II and IV to cover with dust or earth (ه s.o., هـ s.th.) III to be s.o.’s (ه) mate or comrade, be of the same age (ه as s.o.) V to be dusty, be covered with dust ترب tirb pl. اتراب atrāb person of the same age, contemporary, mate, companion, comrade ترب tarib dusty, dust-covered
